description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Pulsar is a drum machine/musical electronic instrument/toy designed for non-musicians and musicians alike. Effortlessly create great sounding musical grooves using one of seven eclectic sound sets. Sounds include electronic percussion, bass and synthesizer oddities.
description.short: Pulsar is a drum machine/musical electronic instrument/toy designed for non-musicians and musicians alike. Effortlessly create great sounding musical grooves using one of seven eclectic sound sets. Sounds include electronic percussion, bass and synthesizer oddities.
